text:
Hey Jenna, at my org, people working on content partnerships, content strategy & processes, and similar fall under marketing team itself.

For content WRITING on the other hand, it's a separate team with just the writers. Hope this helps!

elements.text:
Hey Jenna, at my org, people working on content partnerships, content strategy & processes, and similar fall under marketing team itself.

For content WRITING on the other hand, it's a separate team with just the writers. Hope this helps!

text:
Hi Jenna, at Maze the content team is a separate team under Marketing. Besides content, we also have a brand team, product marketing, community, and growth marketing as separate teams within Marketing. Hope the helps!

<@U02VBUQR0E7> I love your reply. Thank you for sharing this much detail in your replies. I’m not sure if this happened already and I missed it (in which case my bad!) but I’d love an AMA or an Office Hours with you to learn more about your vision for the industry and your experience at NerdWallet and beyond cc <@UJG9WTEKG>
